title: luckperms如何实现两个服务器互通权限组
author: hypBob

replies.author: hypBob
replies.txt_content:
克拉夫 发表于 2019-2-12 11:22
使用mysql,配置成同一个就OK.
要怎么搞呀？

replies.author: 冰星
replies.txt_content: 只要连接到相同的mysql数据库即可

replies.author: hypBob
replies.txt_content:
冰星 发表于 2019-2-13 11:43
只要连接到相同的mysql数据库即可
还是不会呀！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！

replies.author: hypBob
replies.txt_content: 为什么我装luckperms插件跨服的时候Kicked whilst connecting to 生存服: [lp] permissions data for your user was not loaded during the pre-login stage - unable to continue. please try again later
